header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Birds pecking in the garden. Chocolate, art, and theatre. Looking at photos on the computer.
header.activity: A long awaited visit from a brother, catching up.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, anouncing, anecdote telling

speaker.dialect_rep: I may have a slight Somerset accent
speaker.occupation: retired artist and antique dealer/gallery owner
